page.title: 11FILKINS: ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: BOWLING CLUB FETE: Held annually to raise money for maintenance of the Green. It includes side shows, stalls, refreshments and a flower, vegetable & craft show. VILLAGE OPEN DAYS are bien- nial summer events at the moment, to raise money for the Village Hall exten- sion. They offer visitors Cotswold architecture, beautiful gardens, local craftsmen to watch and other varying attractions. Alternate years, the CHUR- CHES organise a FETE or a FLOWER FESTI- VAL. but in 1985, a HARVEST CELEBRATION WEEK was held, which included a Talent Competition, Harvest Supper, and a play and poetry evening. Filkins takes part in a local PLOUGHING MATCH. Proceeds this year went towards buying a large truck for African Famine Relief; also young farmers, using a horse plough with special harness, ploughed an acre of land, hoping to set a record.
